title: Manage Button Models Fix - Requirements
response:

Specific Text Comments:
1. "3. WHEN external OpenAI service returns 404 THEN t...": 这两个暂时不用管，等第一个和第二个解决完了之后再继续调整这两个

comments.comment: 这两个暂时不用管，等第一个和第二个解决完了之后再继续调整这两个
comments.selectedText:
3. WHEN external OpenAI service returns 404 THEN the system SHALL try alternative API endpoints (/v1/models, /models, /api/models, etc.)
4. WHEN all endpoints fail THEN the system SHALL return an empty model list instead of throwing an error
